member.name: T:FluentValidationNA.FailedToCheckValidationException
member.summary: An exception that will be thrown at some point if Check() is not called on validations.

member.name: M:FluentValidationNA.FailedToCheckValidationException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:FluentValidationNA.FailedToCheckValidationException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:FluentValidationNA.FailedToCheckValidationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:FluentValidationNA.Helpers.TrimGenericWrapper(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Trims away a given surrounding type, returning just the generic type argument, if the given type is in fact a generic type with just one type argument and the generic type matches a given wrapper type. Otherwise, it returns the original type.
member.param: The type to trim, or return unmodified.
The SomeType<> generic type definition to trim away from if it is present.
member.returns: , if it is not a generic type instance of ; otherwise the type argument.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Argument_ConvertStringFail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' value must be convertible to type '{1}'..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Argument_EmptyEnumerable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' must have one or more elements..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Argument_EmptyString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'String' cannot be empty..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Argument_EmptyValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' was expected to not be empty..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Argument_NotEmptyValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' was expected to be empty..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Argument_NotNullValue
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' was expected to be null..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Argument_WhiteSpaceString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 'String' cannot contain only white space..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.DefaultAggregateExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Multiple Exceptions Occurred..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.InternalExceptionMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An internal error occurred. Please contact support..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.ServiceMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot find an instance of the '{0}' service..

member.name: P:FluentValidationNA.Strings.Validation_NoCheck
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to A Validation.Check() was never called. Make sure all Validations end with Check(). The fail to call Check() did not necessarily occur at the location this exception was thrown..

member.name: T:FluentValidationNA.ValidationExtensions
member.summary: Provides common checks for all types of validations.

member.name: M:FluentValidationNA.ValidationExtensions.Check(FluentValidationNA.Validation)
member.summary: Performs the validation for the current validation. The first pending validation exception is thrown here.
member.param: The current validation.
member.returns: A null placeholder.

member.name: M:FluentValidationNA.ValidationExtensions.CheckAll(FluentValidationNA.Validation)
member.summary: Performs the validation for the current validation. All pending validation exception are thrown here.

member.returns: A null placeholder.
